org.jnosql.diana.api.document.query

Interface DocumentWhere


  • public interface DocumentWhere
    The Document Where whose define the condition in the query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocumentWhere and(DocumentCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.and(DocumentCondition)
      DocumentQuery build()
      Creates a new instance of DocumentQuery
      DocumentLimit limit(long limit)
      Defines the maximum number of results to retrieve.
      DocumentWhere or(DocumentCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.or(DocumentCondition)
      DocumentOrder orderBy(Sort sort)
      Add the order how the result will returned
      DocumentStart start(long start)
      Defines the position of the first result to retrieve.

    • Method Detail

      • and

        DocumentWhere and(DocumentCondition condition)
           throws NullPointerException
        Appends a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.and(DocumentCondition)
        Parameters:
        condition - a condition to be added
        Returns:
        the same DocumentWhere with the condition appended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when condition is null
